subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Sean Johnson made four saves for his fourth shutout of the season, and Mike Magee scored in the Chicago Fire’s 1-0 victory over the Red Bulls in Bridgeview, Ill.
snippet: Sean Johnson made four saves for his fourth shutout of the season, and Mike Magee scored in the Chicago Fire’s 1-0 victory over the Red Bulls in Bridgeview, Ill.
